history.narrative: Law 3-88 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-274, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 3, 1980 and June 17, 1980, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 2, 1980, it was assigned Act No. 3-206 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
